jobsJson.descriptionPlain: As Business Intelligence Manager you will lead BI operations support for Driver Operations & Platform Team (Driver Team). This role will work closely with Driver Team business leaders and product managers, to enable and enhance analytics capability in making data-driven decisions, and in setting and achieving goals across pods. This position requires strong leadership, communication, and relationship skills as well as strong problem solving and analytical skills. The role reports to the Deputy Head of BI for Driver Operations & Platform.
jobsJson.description: As Business Intelligence Manager you will lead BI operations support for Driver Operations & Platform Team (Driver Team). This role will work closely with Driver Team business leaders and product managers, to enable and enhance analytics capability in making data-driven decisions, and in setting and achieving goals across pods. This position requires strong leadership, communication, and relationship skills as well as strong problem solving and analytical skills. The role reports to the Deputy Head of BI for Driver Operations & Platform.
jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Partner with business and product stakeholders on defining and reporting key metrics performance and insights to drive success in setting and achieving goals
  • Deeply understand and articulate the complexity of Gojek business operations and competitive landscape to influence senior-level decision making across the company through data-driven approaches
  • Contribute to designing and monitoring ETLs that consolidate data into consistent and reliable datasets to support analytics use-cases
  • Educate around BI tools and drive consistent usage
  • Manage and develop a team of BI analysts and engineers

• 7+ years of experience in Business Intelligence, Analytics, or related functions
  • Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
  • Mastery of SQL and experience with BI reporting (i.e. Tableau, Metabase) and databases (dimensional and relational), including data ingestion
  • Comfortable working both independently with minimal guidance and closely in a team setting
  • Excellent communication skills and ability to build solid relationships with individuals at all levels, in multiple geographies and business functions
  • Excellent in communication and good at collaborative working
  • Strong project and process management with proven ability for planning, scheduling and coordinating
  • At least 2 years experience managing and developing talent
